name: BelchBrothersBurp
0:
”Alexa, open Belch Brothers for a burp”
”Alexa, ask Belch Brothers for many polite burps”
”Alexa, ask Belch Brothers to belch politely”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: belch brothers
des:
VERSION 1.5, NOW MEATIER !

NOW WITH PROFESSIONAL BODILY GASES AND MORE ALEXA COMIC RELIEF!

Tired of so many disappointing burp apps? Belch Brothers allows Alexa to just let loose as one of the crew. Unlike other gaseous apps, we at IKSTEROG INNOVATIONS have worked to ensure Alexa not only belches with the best of them, but always has a comeback to compliment her burps! Just ask Help for more information and let those gasses fly! Play often to hear the elusive Burfart!

Iksterog Innovations has officially released Blech Brothers Burp Version 1.5, now featuring brand new, professionally recorded burps, burpsnarts, sharts, quefarts and many other bodily functions from around the world! We are considering possibly creating another application exclusively dedicated to different gasses, expulsions, and other funny body sounds. If you would like to see that become a reality, let us know! Visit our Twitter or email us and say HELLO! IKSTEROG INNOVATIONS is always working on new apps and projects! Be sure to check out our new and upcoming apps; Mortal Kombat app- Choose Your Destiny, our Pokedex app- Pokemon Catalogue, our sleep sounds Star Wars app (Sounds of the Galaxy, and our up-and-coming stock market app! 

To support our other apps and projects, app support, or to stay up to date with our goings on, check out our social media. If you have any questions or just want to shoot the breeze, send us an email!

WWW.IKSTEROG.COM
twitter: https://twitter.com/iksterogi
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Iksterog-Innovations
email: ADMIN@IKSTEROG.COM

TRY SAYING
Shown in English (GB) English (US) English (AU) English (CA) English (IN) 
• Alexa, open belch brothers.
* Alexa, open belch brothers for help
* Alexa, open belch brothers for a polite one.
* Alexa, open belch brothers with many burps
• Alexa, open belch brothers and burp.
• Alexa, open belch brothers for many polite burps
* Alexa, ask belch brothers to burp
* Alexa, ask belch brothers to polite burp
* Alexa, ask belch brothers for polite burps
* Alexa, ask belch brothers for many burps
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
